about_the_game:
Visual Novel, Adv, Romance, otome


Maria's plans for the future are completely ruined, as her parents unexpectedly marry her off. But an unwanted marriage is not the worst thing that awaits Maria, and her own life is at risk.

Features

  • three love interests;
  • one friendship rut;
  • the MC's name can be changed;
  • interactive map of the estate.



Maria's fiancé. Because of an unknown illness, he had hardly ever appeared in society before. Silent. It's hard to know what's on his mind. He seems completely indifferent to everything. But is he really?



Personal servant of Daniel. Extremely loyal to the Dengrof family, where he has worked since he was a child. The only pleasant person in the house, according to Maria. However, he also has his secrets.



A mysterious hunter who helps Maria survive. Rude, cruel, and terribly annoying. But perhaps that mask hides a wounded heart.
